Package athlete

Class Athlete

java.lang.Object
athlete.Athlete
public class Athlete extends Object
This class implements an Athlete that can participate in debates

      public Athlete()

    • Athlete

      public Athlete(String name, int offence, int stamina, int defense, int price, String debateStyle, int speakingStyle)
      a more specific athlete constructor constructs an athlete based on the given parameters
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the athlete
      offence - the offence stat of the athlete
      stamina - the stamina stat of the athlete
      defense - the defense state of the athlete
      price - the price of the athlete
      debateStyle - the preferred debate style of the athlete
      speakingStyle - the speaking style stat of the athlete
